Module com.example.lab_3javafx
Package com.example.lab_3javafx.J2_Lab3_Karpenko.taskone

Class MetroStation

java.lang.Object
com.example.lab_3javafx.J2_Lab3_Karpenko.taskone.MetroStation
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetroStationList
public abstract class MetroStation extends Object
The abstract MetroStation class represents a metro station with a name, opening year, and hours of operation. It provides methods to retrieve and modify the hours of operation, as well as several utility methods to calculate statistics on the station's passenger traffic.
